utils.shortDescription: Commands list for fun, useful commands!
utils.longDescription: Commands list for fun, useful commands!

beans.longDescription: View yours or another user's bean wallet

give.shortDescription: Gives some of your beans to a user.
give.longDescription: Gives some of your beans to a user.

leaderboard.shortDescription: Displays the server leaderboard for top 10 richest users
leaderboard.longDescription: Displays the server leaderboard for top 10 richest users

global.shortDescription: Displays the global leaderboard for top 10 richest users
global.longDescription: Displays the global leaderboard for top 10 richest users

title.longDescription: Sets your title. Title is one of your badges you would like to display on your wallet. Title also changes your wallet color depending on the badge.

daily.shortDescription: Receive your daily spin to win beans! You have a chance to win another spin!
daily.longDescription: Receive your daily spin to win beans!

bet.longDescription: Bet your beans for a chance to get more! You can only bet on **h** or **s**. In the format %bet [amount] [choice]

play.longDescription: Play a guessing game to win beans with your range at the end (Can only choose 20, 50 or 100)!

8ball.shortDescription: Ask me any yes or no question!
8ball.longDescription: Ask me any yes or no question!
8ball.examples:
- %8ball Should I sleep early today?
- %choose Should I eat today?

pickup.shortDescription: Trying to score one with someone? I got you covered ;).
pickup.longDescription: Trying to score one with someone? I got you covered ;). Just type %pickup @user

autorole.shortDescription: Sets role to automatically assign to new users
autorole.longDescription: Sets role to automatically assign to new users

purge.longDescription: Deletes the last x number of messages from the chat! If a user is specified after the number of messages to delete, it deletes the last x messages from that user only. In the case of messages older than 14 days, use `%xpurge`

xpurge.shortDescription: Able to delete messages older than 14 days.

wel.longDescription: Sets the welcome channel to the current channel.

leave.longDescription: Sets the leave channel to the current channel.

setwel.longDescription: Sets the welcome message you want me to say when a user joins the server! You can add {user} to tag the user and {server} to mention the server.
setwel.examples: %setwel Hello {user}! Welcome to {server}. Enjoy your stay.

setleave.longDescription: Sets the leave message you want me to say when a user leaves the server. Also see %setwel.
setleave.examples: %setleave Aww, **{user}** has left the server. You'll be missed :(

welmsg.longDescription: Displays the current welcome message for the server if there is one.

leavemsg.longDescription: Displays the current leave message for the server if there is one.

avatar.shortDescription: Displays yours or another user's avatar
avatar.longDescription: Displays yours or another user's avatar

userinfo.shortDescription: Info on a user in the server!
userinfo.longDescription: Info on a user in the server!

choose.shortDescription: Randomly selects from listed choices separated by a comma!
choose.longDescription: Randomly selects from listed choices separated by a comma!

exp00.shortDescription: Turns earning exp on/off in the current channel.
exp00.longDescription: Turns exp earning on or off for that channel. By default it is turned off.

level00.shortDescription: View yours or another user's level in the server.
level00.longDescription: View yours or another user's level, exp and rank on the server!

levels00.longDescription: Leaderboard for levels on the server. optional number after the command to show that page

lvlmsg00.longDescription: Sets the level up message for the server. Use {user} to tag the user and {level} for the user's new level.
lvlmsg00.examples: - %lvlmsg Woohoo! Congratz {user} on leveling up to **{level}**.

clearexp00.shortDescription: Clears the server exp or a specified user.
clearexp00.longDescription: Clears the server exp. If a user is specified, only clears the user's exp. User can be their @user or simply their id.

shop.longDescription: Displays the bean shop. Type `%buy <item>` to purchase an item.

buy.shortDescription: Purchases an item from the bean shop!
buy.longDescription: Purchases an item from the bean shop!

roleshop.longDescription: Displays the Role Shop where members of the server can buy a server role with their beans!

rs.shortDescription: Add/Remove a role from the role shop!
rs.longDescription: Add/Removes a role from the Roles Shop. You must be server admin and I must have permissions to give out the role. If you're adding to the shop you must specify "add", role_name, and price. If you're removing from the shop, you only specify "remove" and role_name

rbuy00.shortDescription: Buys a role from the role shop with beans
rbuy00.longDescription: Buys a role role from the role shop!

giveaway00.shortDescription: Starts a giveaway event for a certain duration
giveaway00.longDescription: Starts a giveaway event for a specified duration in seconds and randomly selects a winner when the time is up. `%giveaway {time} {prize}` (Max of 12 hours/43200 seconds)
